column5: Anybody know of a repair shop that works on electric motors,Between Oshawa,Peterboro,Belleville ,area.The off on relay/ switch stopped working on mine.Have tried different switches/relays but none will work.I can hook the motor up direct and it will work.The motor is a Bass Pro Prowler.
Call Rockey's in Orillia if you can do the work yourself. They might be able to get and send the part to you. I have order parts from them and get them quickly in the mail. 705-325-3526
